entry.title: [RBX2][Dedicated Servers] - 24C06
entry.content:
Dec 20, 21:58 UTC
Resolved - Start Time : 20/12/2022 21:28 UTC
End Time : 20/12/2022 21:51 UTC
Our technical teams resolved the issue. All impacted services are now operational.

Dec 20, 21:42 UTC
Identified - Start time : 20/12/2022 21:28 UTC
Service impact : Public network is down for all servers
Ongoing actions : Our technical teams are currently working to resolve the problem.

entry.title: [RBX3][Dedicated Servers] - 45B11
entry.content:
Dec 20, 03:21 UTC
Resolved - Start Time : 20/12/2022 02:06 UTC
End Time : 20/12/2022 03:14 UTC
Root cause : The incident was caused by a circuit breaker that tripped.
Our technical teams resolved the issue. All impacted services are now operational.

Dec 20, 02:23 UTC
Identified - Start time : 20/12/2022 02:06 UTC
Service impact : Some servers are unreachable.
Ongoing actions : Our technical teams are working on the issue. Update will be post as significant progress is made.

entry.title: [ERI1][DedicatedServers] - Rack E101C20
entry.content:
Dec 19, 21:47 UTC
Resolved - Start Time : 19/12/2022 20:00 UTC
End Time : 19/12/2022 21:32 UTC
Root cause : Incident due to a problem with the cooling system.
Our technical teams resolved the issue. All impacted services are now operational.

Dec 19, 20:14 UTC
Investigating - Start time : 19/12/2022 20:00 UTC
Service impact : Some servers related to Public Cloud in the rack E101C20 are no longer responding.
Ongoing actions : Our teams are investigating to determine the origin of the incident and fix it.

entry.title: VPS - UK2 - host1437033
entry.content:
Dec 19, 21:37 UTC
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Dec 19, 20:09 UTC
Investigating - Estimated time to recovery : 1 hour(s)

Affected hosts

host1437033

Affected instances

The list of instances listed below are currently
unavailable, due to hardware fault on the hypervisor(s) previously mentioned. We apologize for
